references: K. Atanassov, On the 40th and 41st Smarandache Problems, Notes on Number Theory and Discrete Mathematics, Sophia, Bulgaria, Vol. 4 (1998), No. 3, 101-104.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
K. Atanassov, On Some of Smarandache's Problems
H. Bottomley, Illustration of A000196, A048760, A053186 F. Smarandache, Only Problems, Not Solutions!
J. Castillo, Other Smarandache Type Functions: Inferior/Superior Smarandache f-part of x, Smarandache Notions Journal, Vol. 10, No. 1-2-3, 1999, 202-204.
M. Somos, Sequences used for indexing triangular or square arrays
formula: a(n) = floor(n^(1/2))^2 = A000290(A000196(n)). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 12 2012, Sep 03 2002n^2 repeated (2n+1) times, n=0,1,... - _Zak Seidov_, Oct 25 2008
maple: A048760 := proc(n)    floor(sqrt(n)) ;    %^2 ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, May 19 2016
prog: (Haskell)a048760 = (^ 2) . a000196  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 12 2012(PARI) a(n) = sqrtint(n)^2; \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 06 2015
